T04bsa012_u:4: ādyāṣṭamanavamāḥ syuḥ kleśāḥ karma dvitīyadaśamau ca /
T04bsa012_u:5: śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkhaṃ trisaṅgrahā dvādaśa tu dharmāḥ // Pshk_2 //
T04bsa012_u:6: tribhyo bhavati dvandvaṃ dvandvātprabhavanti sapta saptabhyaḥ /
T04bsa012_u:7: traya udbhavanti bhūyastadeva[tu] bhramati bhavacakram // Pshk_3 //
T04bsa012_u:9: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ // Pshk_4 //
T04bsa012_u:15: draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ bhūtadarśī vimucyate // Pshk_7 //
